t: Amazon.com: Visage Envy Invisible Sun Protection Face Gel SPF 50 - Water-Resistant Paraben-Free Anti-Aging Sunscreen with Red Algae and Omega 3,6,9 for Hydrating and Moisturizing Sensitive Skin - 1.7 Ounce : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I hated to wear sun protection because all of the them regardless of the brand they left my face looking like a grease pit. That is until I found the Visage Envy Invisible Sun Protection. To begin with, it's not that white sticky stuff, it's a gel that you can't see once you put it on.

t: Amazon.com : Visage Envy Facial Moisturizing Lotion Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin E to Hydrate Skin - SPF 30 Lightweight Non-Greasy Daily Face Moisturizer with Sunscreen, 3 Ounce (2 Pack) : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I received a sample of the Visage Envy Facial Moisturizing Lotion SPF 30 to try, & I would call this more of a sunscreen than a facial moisturizing lotion. I use Neutrogena's Daily Moisturizing Lotion, & often substitute that with Target's brand which has the same ingredients as the name brand.
